name: A Lighthouse Story
description:
A small story game about a lighthouse keeper, of sorts.
Can you get the true ending? [:

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 38, theme 'A Small World'.
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/a-lighthous...

Controls
Use movement keys to go left and right, Up / E / Space to interact when prompts appear.

Tools
Unity, Reaper DAW, GIMP, Freesound.org, Typodermic Fonts

(Have created Mac & Linux builds below, but I can only check the Windows one, I can't say if the others work ok or not..)
